name: Leaps and Bounds (regakakobigman)
description:
Leaps and Bounds is a short, retro puzzle platformer about two characters: Leaps, and Bounds. Leaps can waddle around and charge up a powerful jump, allowing him to leap into the sky or punt Bounds into the air. Bounds can't get far off the ground, but he can bound across large gaps, and act as a stepping stone for Leaps.

Github link: https://github.com/themangomago/GameOff2019

Made by mago, regakakobigman, and Miggity Moogity for the GitHub Game Off 2019 using Godot Engine.
